item.title: Influxdb Size
item.description: Reduce Home Assistant InfluxDB size Intro Lately I was running into issues where the recorder stopped recording events, see other article. Some investigation revealed this was most likely caused by a backup locking the database for too long. That made me venture into the HA shell and find out where all this space was being consumed. I’m running full backups every 2 days, keeping 3 backups on HA and some on Google Drive.
